system.description:
Your study of which lore and dedication to their practices have greatly expanded your understanding of the arcane and granted the following benefits:

  • You may add your witch and wizard levels together for the purpose of what spells you can prepare, but only for spells that are on both the wizard and witch spell lists. These spells count against your normal number of prepared spells and the total number of higher level spells each class may prepare is equal to your proficiency bonus.
  • You may add half your wizard levels to your witch level for the purpose of the ritual mastery ability.
  • You may add half your witch level to your wizard level for the purpose of your arcane recovery feature.
